summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of an entity named "Christensen." The documents primarily focus on Julia Wetzel from the NSA visiting the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) to review a report regarding an interview with Sgt Nicholas B. Stevenson. The purpose of the visit was to ensure the appropriate classification of sensitive information related to communications intelligence (COMINT) and a facility able to collect the Lisbon-Tangier link. The documents do not provide any information about a person named Christensen or their involvement in the JFK assassination context.
significance: Since Christensen is not mentioned in the documents, their significance in the JFK context cannot be determined.
